topic.title: How this solution works
topic.shortdesc: Not to be confused, this is a description of how the solution works

ul.li: [DM] = can be do dynamically or manually

body.p: This is the description of the processes:

ul.li: [DM] Installation of FusionInventoryagent to have a complete inventory of this server
[D] FusionInventory sends an inventory to GLPI
[D] Plugin Monitoring set ressources to this new server defined by rules (in components catalogs)
[DM] Restart Shinken' Arbiter module to load new configuration
[D] Shinken send events to GLPI MySQL database
[D] A system cron script updates RRDTOOL files with these events and generates/updates the graphs
User can see events in GLPI or via an application on his Android smartphone

body.p: Conclusion: Adding a new device to be monitored is simple and doesn't require any human intervention.
